name: LeShop - Fashion Designer
description:
Welcome to LeShop : Fashion Design!

The original LeShop beloved by 30M people just arrived on your phone!
Play Top Models Fashion Show to show off your fashion skills. Dress-up like a celebrity and you can walk around Downtown and Uptown.


Thousands of Beautiful Costumes

- Customize your avatar with thousands of beautiful costumes. Use COINS to purchase various costumes to adorn your avatar. You can also collect PARTS to exchange with rare costumes. Let’s visit the shops and collect your favorites.

Top Models Fashion Show : “Change your clothes, match the theme!”

- Yes, Top Models Fashion Show is Back! Make costume combinations to match color & style themes. Pose yourself on time for more points. You will get coins and parts in the fashion show, and you can use them for more costumes.

Show your fashion sense in Downtown & Uptown!

- Meet other people and play Fashion Battle together. Tap on avatars to see the combinations with the designed theme. It will be a good hint for styling! You can also play 1-on-1 Fashion Challenge with other avatars. More locations to be added soon.

Capture your avatar for SNS profile

- Spread the words to all over the SNS. Capture your avatar and use the pictures for SNS profile to brag your beautiful avatars to others.
